mapper.select: SELECT LENDING_SEQ, BOOK_SERIAL, MEMBER_CODE, LENDING_DELAY, RETURN_STATUS, LENDING_DATE, END_DATE, BACK_DATE, RESERVE_DATE FROM (SELECT LENDING_SEQ, BOOK_SERIAL, MEMBER_CODE, LENDING_DELAY, RETURN_STATUS, LENDING_DATE, END_DATE, BACK_DATE, RESERVE_DATE FROM LENDING l ORDER BY LENDING_SEQ DESC) WHERE BOOK_SERIAL = #{book_serial} AND ROWNUM <2 AND BACK_DATE IS NULL AND LENDING_DATE IS NOT NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE POSSESSING_BOOK SET LD ='N', DL='N', BA='Y', OD='N', DG='Y' WHERE BOOK_SERIAL = (SELECT pb2.BOOK_SERIAL FROM POSSESSING_BOOK pb2 LEFT OUTER JOIN LENDING l ON pb2.BOOK_SERIAL=l.BOOK_SERIAL WHERE l.lending_seq=#{lending_seq})

UPDATE POSSESSING_BOOK SET NM='N', DG='N', RV='N' WHERE BOOK_SERIAL = (SELECT pb2.BOOK_SERIAL FROM POSSESSING_BOOK pb2 LEFT OUTER JOIN LENDING l ON pb2.BOOK_SERIAL=l.BOOK_SERIAL WHERE l.lending_seq=#{lending_seq})
UPDATE POSSESSING_BOOK SET DG = 'N' WHERE BOOK_SERIAL = (SELECT pb2.BOOK_SERIAL FROM POSSESSING_BOOK pb2 LEFT OUTER JOIN LENDING l ON pb2.BOOK_SERIAL=l.BOOK_SERIAL WHERE l.lending_seq=#{lending_seq})
UPDATE LIB_MEMBER SET RENTAL_COUNT=RENTAL_COUNT-1 WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_code}
UPDATE POSSESSING_BOOK SET OD ='Y' WHERE BOOK_SERIAL IN (SELECT l.BOOK_SERIAL FROM LENDING l WHERE BACK_DATE IS NULL AND SYSDATE - END_DATE >= 1)
mapper.select: SELECT LENDING_SEQ FROM LENDING l WHERE (SELECT TO_DATE(SYSDATE) - ED FROM (SELECT LENDING_SEQ ,TO_DATE(END_DATE) AS ED FROM LENDING) se WHERE se.LENDING_SEQ=l.LENDING_SEQ)=3 AND BACK_DATE IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE LENDING SET LENDING_DELAY='Y', END_DATE=LENDING_DATE+21 WHERE LENDING_SEQ = #{lending_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM POSSESSING_BOOK pb WHERE WH = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM POSSESSING_BOOK pb WHERE SP = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE LIB_MEMBER SET AUTH ='NM' WHERE MEMBER_CODE = (SELECT l.MEMBER_CODE M FROM LENDING l WHERE SYSDATE-END_DATE>=1 AND BACK_DATE IS NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT l.LENDING_SEQ, pb.BOOK_SERIAL, l.MEMBER_CODE, lm.PHONE, lm.EMAIL , lm.NAME, l.RESERVE_DATE FROM LENDING l JOIN POSSESSING_BOOK pb ON l.BOOK_SERIAL = pb.BOOK_SERIAL JOIN LIB_MEMBER lm ON l.MEMBER_CODE = lm.MEMBER_CODE WHERE pb.BOOK_SERIAL = #{book_serial} AND RV ='Y' AND ROWNUM < 2 AND l.LENDING_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY LENDING_SEQ DESC
